title: Immaculate Spacious Home 3BR+Bonus Rm,Garage,Views,Garden,Walk to Bart
posting_body: This is a sunny Marina-style single family home on a tree-lined street that contains 3 spacious bedrooms + bonus room, 2 full bathrooms, garage parking, and an extra large storage space with a colorful private garden in Mission Terrace.
The main floor includes a large formal living room, dining room, a kitchen with stainless steel appliances and breakfast nook, 2 large bedrooms, and a full bathroom with a separate shower.
The skylight and glass-covered central patio brightens the entire level.
The lower floor consists of a kitchenette, full bathroom, large bedroom, plus a bonus room that can be used as a living room or a suite.
There are beautiful refinished hardwood floors and dual-paned windows throughout the house.
All bedrooms have a city lights and garden view.
The garage fits 2 compact cars and street parking is fairly easy.
The colorful, well-maintained garden with fruit trees stays lush all year round.

The house is in a walkable area with bike lanes—a few blocks’ walk to Glen Park bart station, village bookstore, shops, markets, restaurants and cafes—and has quick and convenient access to freeways 280 and 101 to downtown SF and the Peninsula.
95 Walk Score, 86 Transit Score, 72 Bike Score.
If you are interested in viewing the home, please describe a little bit about yourself and any other occupants, including your gross income, credit scores, and contact number.
